snippet.title: Overwatch 2 x My Hero Academia | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
It’s time to become the hero or villain you were meant to be.

The fight between good and evil rages on in Overwatch 2 x My Hero Academia. Step onto the battlefield with Tracer as Deku, Reinhardt as All Might, Juno as Uravity, Kiriko as Himiko Toga, and Reaper as Tomura Shigaraki.

Collect the Mega Bundle for all five legendary skins and even more exclusive cosmetics inspired by My Hero Academia.

Overwatch 2 x My Hero Academia arrives in-game Oct 17.

Overwatch 2 is free to play for everyone on console & PC!

© K. Horikoshi / Shueisha, My Hero Academia Project
_
